docs.title: Jitsi Meet – Source Installer
docs.text:
Enterprise-grade documentation for installing Jitsi Meet from source.

This documentation is auto-aligned with the jitsi-master.sh installer and supports:

  • LAN / Home network deployments
  • Cloud / HTTPS deployments
  • Source builds (Prosody, Jicofo, JVB, Web UI)
  • Rollbacks and cleanups

docs.title: Architecture
docs.text:
flowchart LR
Browser --> Nginx --> Prosody
Prosody --> Jicofo --> JVB

docs.title: Menu Flow
docs.text:
1) Prerequisites
2) Prosody
3) JVB
4) Jicofo
5) Web UI

flowchart TD
    A[Start] --> B[Prerequisites]
    B --> C[Prosody]
    C --> D[JVB]
    D --> E[Jicofo]
    E --> F[Web UI]

docs.title: Jicofo – Conference Focus
docs.text:
Built from source.

git clone https://github.com/jitsi/jicofo.git
mvn clean package -DskipTests

graph LR
Prosody --> Jicofo
Jicofo --> JVB

docs.title: Jitsi Videobridge (JVB)
docs.text:
Handles RTP traffic.

graph TD
Client1 --> JVB
Client2 --> JVB

docs.title: Prosody (XMPP)
docs.text:
Prosody handles signaling.

sequenceDiagram
Browser->>Prosody: Join room
Prosody->>Jicofo: Conference request
